summary: A young Englishman marries a glamorous American. When he brings her home to meet the parents, she arrives like a blast from the future - blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window.
cast: Jessica Biel|Ben Barnes|Kristin Scott Thomas|Colin Firth|Kimberley Nixon|Katherine Parkinson|Kris Marshall|Christian Brassington|Charlotte Riley|Jim McManus|Pip Torrens|Jeremy Hooton|Joanna Bacon|Maggie Hickey|Georgie Glen|David Longstaff|Mike Archer|Rebel Penfold-Russell|Stewart Clarke|Oliver Reid|Joe Reid|Stephan Elliott|Sheridan Jobbins|Fizz|Laurence Richardson
title: Una familia con clase
